title: Pogačar Gifts Pink Jersey in Class Act After ‘Accidental’ Giro d’Italia Win That Leaves Rivals in Awe
content:
'We didn't want to go for the stage': Pogačar won a fifth stage Tuesday without really wanting to and then gifted his pink jersey to the rider he beat.

Read the full article at Pogačar Gifts Pink Jersey in Class Act After ‘Accidental’ Giro d’Italia Win That Leaves Rivals in Awe on Velo.
